TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyGeneratedEventHandler(object sender, PropertyGeneratedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyGeneratedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you create a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PropertyGeneratedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
